# invalidate(view:)

**Instance Method**

Indicates to the system that an aspect of a view is invalid and triggers the necessary update.

## Declaration

```swift
func invalidate(view: UIView)
```

## Parameters

- **view**: The view that requires invalidating.

## Discussion

A type that conforms to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewInvalidating] implements this method to perform any actions necessary to notify the system that an aspect of your view is invalid. For more info, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/Invalidating].

## Invalidating the view

- **UIView.Invalidations**: Changes that cause an aspect of a view to be invalid and require an update.
